command.confirmation: Are you sure you want to perform this operation?

help.short: Name of the virtual network tap configuration.

command.name: create

help.short: Name of the virtual network tap configuration.

command.argGroup:
<arg type="array" var="$tapConfigurationParameters.properties.virtualNetworkTap.properties.destinationLoadBalancerFrontEndIPConfiguration.zones" options="zones">
<arg type="array" var="$tapConfigurationParameters.properties.virtualNetworkTap.properties.destinationNetworkInterfaceIPConfiguration.properties.applicationGatewayBackendAddressPools" options="application-gateway-backend-address-pools" group="Properties">
<arg type="array" var="$tapConfigurationParameters.properties.virtualNetworkTap.properties.destinationNetworkInterfaceIPConfiguration.properties.applicationGatewayBackendAddressPools[].properties.backendAddresses" options="backend-addresses" group="Properties">
<arg type="array<@ApplicationSecurityGroup_create>" var="$tapConfigurationParameters.properties.virtualNetworkTap.properties.destinationNetworkInterfaceIPConfiguration.properties.applicationSecurityGroups" options="application-security-groups" group="Properties">
<arg type="array" var="$tapConfigurationParameters.properties.virtualNetworkTap.properties.destinationNetworkInterfaceIPConfiguration.properties.loadBalancerBackendAddressPools" options="load-balancer-backend-address-pools" group="Properties">

<arg type="array" var="@PublicIPAddress_create.properties.natGateway.zones" options="zones">
<arg type="array" var="@PublicIPAddress_create.zones" options="zones">
<arg type="array" var="@Subnet_create.properties.addressPrefixes" options="address-prefixes" group="Properties">
<arg type="array" var="@Subnet_create.properties.applicationGatewayIPConfigurations" options="application-gateway-ip-configurations" group="Properties">
<arg type="array" var="@Subnet_create.properties.delegations" options="delegations" group="Properties">
<arg type="array<@SubResource_create>" var="@Subnet_create.properties.ipAllocations" options="ip-allocations" group="Properties">
<arg type="array" var="@Subnet_create.properties.networkSecurityGroup.properties.securityRules" options="security-rules" group="Properties">
<arg type="array" var="@Subnet_create.properties.networkSecurityGroup.properties.securityRules[].properties.destinationAddressPrefixes" options="destination-address-prefixes" group="Properties">
<arg type="array<@ApplicationSecurityGroup_create>" var="@Subnet_create.properties.networkSecurityGroup.properties.securityRules[].properties.destinationApplicationSecurityGroups" options="destination-application-security-groups" group="Properties">
<arg type="array" var="@Subnet_create.properties.networkSecurityGroup.properties.securityRules[].properties.destinationPortRanges" options="destination-port-ranges" group="Properties">
<arg type="array" var="@Subnet_create.properties.networkSecurityGroup.properties.securityRules[].properties.sourceAddressPrefixes" options="source-address-prefixes" group="Properties">
<arg type="array" var="@Subnet_create.properties.networkSecurityGroup.properties.securityRules[].properties.sourceApplicationSecurityGroups" options="source-application-security-groups" group="Properties">
<arg type="array" var="@Subnet_create.properties.networkSecurityGroup.properties.securityRules[].properties.sourcePortRanges" options="source-port-ranges" group="Properties">
<arg type="array" var="@Subnet_create.properties.routeTable.properties.routes" options="routes" group="Properties">
<arg type="array" var="@Subnet_create.properties.serviceEndpointPolicies" options="service-endpoint-policies" group="Properties">
<arg type="array" var="@Subnet_create.properties.serviceEndpointPolicies[].properties.contextualServiceEndpointPolicies" options="contextual-service-endpoint-policies" group="Properties">

<arg type="array" var="@Subnet_create.properties.serviceEndpoints" options="service-endpoints" group="Properties">
<arg type="array" var="@Subnet_create.properties.serviceEndpoints[].locations" options="locations">
<arg type="array" var="$tapConfigurationParameters.properties.virtualNetworkTap.properties.destinationNetworkInterfaceIPConfiguration.properties.virtualNetworkTaps" options="virtual-network-taps" group="Properties">
<arg type="array" var="@VirtualNetworkTap_create.properties.destinationLoadBalancerFrontEndIPConfiguration.zones" options="zones">

<prop type="array" name="applicationGatewayBackendAddressPools" arg="$tapConfigurationParameters.properties.virtualNetworkTap.properties.destinationNetworkInterfaceIPConfiguration.properties.applicationGatewayBackendAddressPools">
<prop type="array" name="backendAddresses" arg="$tapConfigurationParameters.properties.virtualNetworkTap.properties.destinationNetworkInterfaceIPConfiguration.properties.applicationGatewayBackendAddressPools[].properties.backendAddresses">
<prop type="array<@ApplicationSecurityGroup_create>" name="applicationSecurityGroups" arg="$tapConfigurationParameters.properties.virtualNetworkTap.properties.destinationNetworkInterfaceIPConfiguration.properties.applicationSecurityGroups">

<prop type="array" name="loadBalancerInboundNatRules" arg="$tapConfigurationParameters.properties.virtualNetworkTap.properties.destinationNetworkInterfaceIPConfiguration.properties.loadBalancerInboundNatRules">
<prop type="array" name="ipTags" arg="@PublicIPAddress_create.properties.ipTags">
<prop type="array<@SubResource_create>" name="publicIpAddresses" arg="@PublicIPAddress_create.properties.natGateway.properties.publicIpAddresses">

<prop type="array" name="zones" arg="@PublicIPAddress_create.zones">
<prop type="array" name="addressPrefixes" arg="@Subnet_create.properties.addressPrefixes">
<prop type="array" name="applicationGatewayIPConfigurations" arg="@Subnet_create.properties.applicationGatewayIPConfigurations">
<prop type="array" name="delegations" arg="@Subnet_create.properties.delegations">
<prop type="array<@SubResource_create>" name="ipAllocations" arg="@Subnet_create.properties.ipAllocations">
<prop type="array" name="securityRules" arg="@Subnet_create.properties.networkSecurityGroup.properties.securityRules">
<prop type="array" name="destinationAddressPrefixes" arg="@Subnet_create.properties.networkSecurityGroup.properties.securityRules[].properties.destinationAddressPrefixes">

<prop type="array" name="destinationPortRanges" arg="@Subnet_create.properties.networkSecurityGroup.properties.securityRules[].properties.destinationPortRanges">

<prop type="array" name="routes" arg="@Subnet_create.properties.routeTable.properties.routes">
<prop type="array" name="serviceEndpointPolicies" arg="@Subnet_create.properties.serviceEndpointPolicies">
<prop type="array" name="contextualServiceEndpointPolicies" arg="@Subnet_create.properties.serviceEndpointPolicies[].properties.contextualServiceEndpointPolicies">
<prop type="array" name="serviceEndpointPolicyDefinitions" arg="@Subnet_create.properties.serviceEndpointPolicies[].properties.serviceEndpointPolicyDefinitions">
<prop type="array" name="serviceResources" arg="@Subnet_create.properties.serviceEndpointPolicies[].properties.serviceEndpointPolicyDefinitions[].properties.serviceResources">
<prop type="array" name="serviceEndpoints" arg="@Subnet_create.properties.serviceEndpoints">
<prop type="array" name="locations" arg="@Subnet_create.properties.serviceEndpoints[].locations">
<prop type="array" name="virtualNetworkTaps" arg="$tapConfigurationParameters.properties.virtualNetworkTap.properties.destinationNetworkInterfaceIPConfiguration.properties.virtualNetworkTaps">
<prop type="array" name="zones" arg="@VirtualNetworkTap_create.properties.destinationLoadBalancerFrontEndIPConfiguration.zones">
<prop type="array" name="applicationGatewayBackendAddressPools" arg="@VirtualNetworkTap_create.properties.destinationNetworkInterfaceIPConfiguration.properties.applicationGatewayBackendAddressPools">
<prop type="array" name="backendAddresses" arg="@VirtualNetworkTap_create.properties.destinationNetworkInterfaceIPConfiguration.properties.applicationGatewayBackendAddressPools[].properties.backendAddresses">

command.name: update

help.short: Name of the virtual network tap configuration.

command.argGroup:
<arg nullable="True" type="array" var="@VirtualNetworkTap_update.properties.destinationLoadBalancerFrontEndIPConfiguration.zones" options="zones">
<arg nullable="True" type="array" var="@VirtualNetworkTap_update.properties.destinationNetworkInterfaceIPConfiguration.properties.applicationGatewayBackendAddressPools" options="application-gateway-backend-address-pools" group="Properties">
<arg nullable="True" type="array" var="@VirtualNetworkTap_update.properties.destinationNetworkInterfaceIPConfiguration.properties.applicationGatewayBackendAddressPools[].properties.backendAddresses" options="backend-addresses" group="Properties">
<arg nullable="True" type="array<@ApplicationSecurityGroup_update>" var="@VirtualNetworkTap_update.properties.destinationNetworkInterfaceIPConfiguration.properties.applicationSecurityGroups" options="application-security-groups" group="Properties">
<arg nullable="True" type="array" var="@VirtualNetworkTap_update.properties.destinationNetworkInterfaceIPConfiguration.properties.loadBalancerBackendAddressPools" options="load-balancer-backend-address-pools" group="Properties">
<arg nullable="True" type="array" var="@VirtualNetworkTap_update.properties.destinationNetworkInterfaceIPConfiguration.properties.loadBalancerBackendAddressPools[].properties.loadBalancerBackendAddresses" options="load-balancer-backend-addresses" group="Properties">
<arg nullable="True" type="array" var="@VirtualNetworkTap_update.properties.destinationNetworkInterfaceIPConfiguration.properties.loadBalancerBackendAddressPools[].properties.tunnelInterfaces" options="tunnel-interfaces" group="Properties">
<arg nullable="True" type="array" var="@VirtualNetworkTap_update.properties.destinationNetworkInterfaceIPConfiguration.properties.loadBalancerInboundNatRules" options="load-balancer-inbound-nat-rules" group="Properties">
<help short="Private IP address of the IP configuration. It can be a single IP address or a CIDR block in the format /."/>
<arg nullable="True" type="array" var="@PublicIPAddress_update.properties.ipTags" options="ip-tags" group="Properties">
<arg nullable="True" type="array<@SubResource_update>" var="@PublicIPAddress_update.properties.natGateway.properties.publicIpAddresses" options="public-ip-addresses" group="Properties">
<arg nullable="True" type="array<@SubResource_update>" var="@PublicIPAddress_update.properties.natGateway.properties.publicIpPrefixes" options="public-ip-prefixes" group="Properties">
<arg nullable="True" type="array" var="@PublicIPAddress_update.properties.natGateway.zones" options="zones">
<arg nullable="True" type="array" var="@PublicIPAddress_update.zones" options="zones">
<arg nullable="True" type="array" var="@Subnet_update.properties.addressPrefixes" options="address-prefixes" group="Properties">
<arg nullable="True" type="array" var="@Subnet_update.properties.applicationGatewayIPConfigurations" options="application-gateway-ip-configurations" group="Properties">
<arg nullable="True" type="array" var="@Subnet_update.properties.delegations" options="delegations" group="Properties">
<arg nullable="True" type="array<@SubResource_update>" var="@Subnet_update.properties.ipAllocations" options="ip-allocations" group="Properties">
<arg nullable="True" type="array" var="@Subnet_update.properties.networkSecurityGroup.properties.securityRules" options="security-rules" group="Properties">
<arg nullable="True" type="array" var="@Subnet_update.properties.networkSecurityGroup.properties.securityRules[].properties.destinationAddressPrefixes" options="destination-address-prefixes" group="Properties">
<arg nullable="True" type="array<@ApplicationSecurityGroup_update>" var="@Subnet_update.properties.networkSecurityGroup.properties.securityRules[].properties.destinationApplicationSecurityGroups" options="destination-application-security-groups" group="Properties">
<arg nullable="True" type="array" var="@Subnet_update.properties.networkSecurityGroup.properties.securityRules[].properties.destinationPortRanges" options="destination-port-ranges" group="Properties">
<arg nullable="True" type="array" var="@Subnet_update.properties.networkSecurityGroup.properties.securityRules[].properties.sourceAddressPrefixes" options="source-address-prefixes" group="Properties">
<arg nullable="True" type="array" var="@Subnet_update.properties.networkSecurityGroup.properties.securityRules[].properties.sourceApplicationSecurityGroups" options="source-application-security-groups" group="Properties">
<arg nullable="True" type="array" var="@Subnet_update.properties.networkSecurityGroup.properties.securityRules[].properties.sourcePortRanges" options="source-port-ranges" group="Properties">
<arg nullable="True" type="array" var="@Subnet_update.properties.routeTable.properties.routes" options="routes" group="Properties">
<arg nullable="True" type="array" var="@Subnet_update.properties.serviceEndpointPolicies" options="service-endpoint-policies" group="Properties">
<arg nullable="True" type="array" var="@Subnet_update.properties.serviceEndpointPolicies[].properties.contextualServiceEndpointPolicies" options="contextual-service-endpoint-policies" group="Properties">
<arg nullable="True" type="array" var="@Subnet_update.properties.serviceEndpointPolicies[].properties.serviceEndpointPolicyDefinitions" options="service-endpoint-policy-definitions" group="Properties">
